Html:
HI,

I thought that the library could detect the version of the target server but it rather checks the machine that's running the program with Library. Imagine that from a Win7 PC I want to query a Windows 2003 server without me forcing v1 but rather checking the target OS. Do you plan to add that kind of "detection"?

Thanks.
There are a number of methods to determine the version of a remote OS. The library version on them is easy to determine: If Windows 2003 or earlier, it will only support V1.
